reference: Card, David. Longitudinal Analysis of Strike Activity, National Bureau of Economic Research Working Paper no. 2263, NBER, May 1987. Hendricks, Wallace and Lawrence Kahn. Wage Indexation in the United States. Cola or Uncola?. Ballinger Publishing Company, Cambridge, MA 1985. Dutn Definitions and Sources
Wage variables Average expected real wage, average realized real wage, and initial real wage constructed from wage data published in Current Wage Developments are measured in 1967 cents.
Consumer Price Index Consumer price index for wage earners (1967=100) (Monthly Labor Review)
